titles.title: Broadcast Savings Act
A bill to discontinue the Voice of America: Radio Marti and Television Marti broadcasts to Cuba.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 3/3/2011--Introduced. Broadcast Savings Act - Repeals: (1) the Radio Broadcasting to Cuba Act, and (2) the Television Broadcasting to Cuba Act. (Thus eliminating Voice of America: Radio/Television Marti broadcasts to Cuba.)
